title: The Pack 001: A Wolf in Egypt
description: Former Assassin Khenti is now a fugitive from the Lotus Kingdom and running for his life. His only hope is to reunite with his brother Nekhet and escape to Nubia. However, he soon finds there are much more dangerous things then soldiers lurking in the Egyptian Marshes... "The Pack" is a Graphic Novel about a motley group of Nubian and Egyptian Werewolves. It follows their tales and misadventures as they travel through the fantasy land of Africaâ€¦
author: Paul Louise-Julie
